overview:
Johnathon Kane began his career as a Financial Advisor in Commercial Banking. Migrated from the Caribbean (Trinidad & Tobago) to Florida in 2003, where he worked as a Senior Consultant for several financial firms such as: Mid America Funding, Premier Processing and the Morgan Stanley Investment Firm.

In August 2004, Johnathon Kane founded Kane Acquisition and Finance ” KAF. Co. In his role as CEO, his responsibilities included the development of several company’s operational structures and strategic growth plans. Previously, Johnathon held several top management positions at International Stock Traders Inc. ” Director of Investments” , from 2001 to 2003, Johnathon was the youngest Marketing Director at Magnum , Magnum internet communications company where he was responsible for product development and innovation of the company’s offerings worldwide. He played a key leadership role in accelerating the company’s product offering and its engineering infrastructure, as well as successfully integrating wireless broadband High-speed wireless transmission of data. What is “high” speed is always a changing number. Wireless systems are typically slower than land-based, wireline networks. In the past, wireless broadband started at 250 Kbps, whereas land-based broadband was generally considered to start at T1

Johnathon earned a BA in International Marketing and a BA in Engineering from University of West Indies
